docs.text: Welcome to Musiconnect For full documentation visit Musiconnect . Musicians can see their own profile: Musicians can see their Picture, Name and Genre. They can see their Following and Follower list using Following and Follower button . They can set their price and advance amount as well. Follow/Unfollow : After searching for a musician, Audiences and Musicians both the users can see a Follow/Unfollow button. Musicians can follow each other by clicking the Follow Button. Audiences can follow the musicians as well. Unfollow button will only be visible if they already follow the searched Musician. Based on this,the Following/Follower list will be updated. Audiences/Musicians can see posts on their home page based on their Followings : Post will only be appeared on the home page if they follow that particular Musician.
